title: "Stranded Fish"?
content:
Why do we call the little green one-eyed monster in Keen3 a "Stranded Fish"?

Is there any official proof that the little guy is a fish?~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Re: "Stranded Fish"?
content:
Um... I don't know because I don't have the manual.

But I am guessing maybe they said so in the manual? Maybe?
Either that or someone like Tom Hall said so. (Kinda like the Treasure Hunters thing.)

But I mean why shouldn't we call them that? They DO look like fish do they not? And they aren't in water so they are stranded. Sounds like the best name to me.

As it says on Spatang-*AHEM* DOS Classics.
[url=http://dosclassics.com/keen/keen.php?go=Stranded%20Fish]Fish that are stranded. What else could they be?[/url]-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

title: Re: "Stranded Fish"?
content: I just checked the CKHINT.EXE file and there's no mention of the "fish" in it, so I bet we'll just have to stick with Stranded Fish.

title: Re: "Stranded Fish"?
content:
Interestingly, these have no always been known as stranded fish, although the name 'Stranded Fish' is the most compact one for them.

It was argued a few years back [for those of you who remember] that these were some sort of plant-animal hybrid, much like zooplankton on earth. While unable to move as its rooted in the ground this plant is covered with a number of sharp 'leaves' that look rather like fins and can flex to cut any attacking herbivore. The eyes help the plant see potential attackers.

Howver the name 'Animal-Plant-Hybrid' never caught on.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: "Stranded Fish"?
content:
But it makes more sense.

Still... I don't think it looks like a fish in the least.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Re: "Stranded Fish"?
content: i always thought is was a cactus[url=http://profile.xfire.com/memsys][img]http://miniprofile.xfire.com/bg/bg/type/2/memsys.png[/img][/url]

title: hmm...
content: Honestly, I think the association began when we chose custom titles... Xtraverse chose "Stranded Fish" and had the image as his avatar for a while, if memory serves, so I'd blame him. Or whoever it was that did that.

title: Re: hmm...
content: I didn't come up with the name stranded fish, I just saw it somewhere on the forum and decided to use it :P[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]
